blog.name: theoujousama
blog.title: Milanhime
blog.description: Hello~! I'm currently remodeling my page, but this is just a place for me to ease in my OC doodles, fanfic stuff, and possibly make good conversation with new friends! Right now I'm interested in KHR, Utapri, and BroCon. I do not do imagines nor headcannons unless they involve any of my OCs. Feel free to ask me anything if interested.

body:
[BNHA OC] The Dark Knight: Boogeyman

As I’m learning more about the BNHA universe due to piqued interest, I decided to make a BNHA OC for fun. She will be a transfer student from America to Class 1-A as its first foreign student.

I won’t be doing any heavy work such as writing for her since this is purely for fun. I’ll most likely just draw only. Ships would be fun, so if you guys wanna give suggestions to her as I develop her more, that’d be cool! I like to pair anyway, but I don’t know who to pair her with yet. NOTE: Things MIGHT change as I keep working on her.

Her hero name is The Dark Knight: Boogeyman, and her Quirk is of the same name. She can manipulate fear, and generate/manipulate darkness. This OC is the bi-product of two former enemy families and Quirks, the Naga and the Tengu (in Buddhist/Hindu mythology, the relative is the Garuda), and unlike most Quirks, she was born with hers.

With her mother being a strong user of the Naga Quirk, and her father having greatly developed his Daitengu Quirk, this OC’s Quirk manifested as the the result of her parents’ family’s fear (mainly her father’s side) of the union between these two powerhouses and the two births of her older brothers.

Despite her Quirk, this OC’s personality and appearance is quite the opposite. Even with villain-like powers (like Hitoshi Shinsou, you could say), the OC was challenged and given a new outlook on her powers that she was initially insecure about. And like the mythological and original Boogeyman who scared children to not misbehave and do good instead, this Boogeyman discouraged evil and misbehaviors with her own twist of unconventional yet heroic abilities.

She is sugar, spice, and everything nice. But she ain’t no Powerpuff Girl (no offense to them much love).

summary: DJ Deku - Chapter 6 - tiffersthenerdy - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Ou
body:
DJ Deku - Chapter 6 - tiffersthenerdy - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Ou

“I’ll be safe about it though, I promise,” Deku says reassuringly, bumping his shoulder with Shouto’s. “Did you see all the green on the dance floor? It’s like a leprechaun party down there. That’s what Fuyumi should have advertised this weekend’s theme to be,” he says with a laugh.

“It looks like your hair came to life on the dance floor,” Shouto replies, amusement lacing the words as he says them. Deku looks at him flabbergasted. It makes Shouto crack the tiniest hint of a smile.

Izuku starts laughing and can’t seem to bring himself to stop. Once he calms down he asks, “was that a smile I saw? Did the forever bored Todoroki Shouto smile at me?”

“Maybe I did,” Shouto answers with the ghost of a smirk.

“I don’t know how much more my heart can handle. I can live the rest of my life in complete happiness knowing I’ve seen you smile.” 

————————————————-

Back to back updates! I can’t deny that I had chapter 6 written before chapter 5.

blog.description: Yo!! Patreon information can be found HERE!! Again, this isn't required for the blog, but it's an amazing way to support us further and get some amazing perks! ASK BOX FOR SCENARIOS AND HEADCANONS: CLOSED!!! ASK BOX FOR MATCHUPS: OPEN EVERYDAY!!! Current post Schedule: 2-3 posts from 5:00PM EST to 9:00PM EST!!!! BNHA blog here, ready to deliver some delightful scenarios, random posts I enjoy, and everything in between! Rules can be found HERE! If you have any questions, please go ahead and ask! MASTERLIST can be found HERE!!! ~ Admin HeroWeekly (OG), Admin Bomb, Admin Blue, Admin Eun, Admin Peaches, Admin Lyssa, and Admin Jorts!!!

summary: Wow this is self indulgent but uh. Dabi with a boyfriend that’s very emotional, but when overloaded with emotion, goes totally...
question: Wow this is self indulgent but uh. Dabi with a boyfriend that’s very emotional, but when overloaded with emotion, goes totally numb? Like if something really bad happens to them they might tear up or cry a little bit but they genuinely don’t feel any emotion at all at that one moment. Or they get really scared and just go blank. That kinda thing. Hope it makes sense? Headcanon or scenario format is fine by me! Thank you!
answer:
Hello! Nothing wrong with being a little self-indulgent once in a while!

~Admin HeroWeekly

- He’s taken aback by it the first time it happens. Dabi isn’t one to deal with emotion like that, so it really throws a curve-ball at him

- Dabi would kind of just walk over to his boyfriend with a concerned look on his face, and would ask if something was wrong

- Once he realized that it was just their way of reacting, he’d simply hold them and let them know he’s there for them

- While Dabi doesn’t completely understand what happened, he would ride the feeling out with them and would do anything his boyfriend asked to try and help deal with whatever was happening

- Depending on how long it lasted, Dabi would either try to coax his boyfriend out of those emotions by doing something else in that instant, or would slowly try to bring them back to a state were emotion is a thing

- Afterwards, he’d want to know all of it. Why it happened, what caused it, what to look for in the future. Literally would ask his boyfriend a million questions

- Dabi wouldn’t push the subject, but if he felt this was happening, he’d ask what kinds of things had happened in the past (if he didn’t know them) that would lead to this
